title: Tandoori chicken lollipop drumsticks with raita dip
description: These spiced chicken bites make delicious meaty canapés – pass them around at a party and watch them disappear.
serves: Serves 4 as a main or 6 as a starter
ingredients: 12 chicken drumsticks (leg and thigh meat), skin removed
5cm/2in piece fresh root ginger, skin on, finely grated
½ cucumber, skin and seeds removed, finely diced
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh mint leaves
2 tbsp finely chopped fresh coriander leaves
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
